name: Type&Shoot - Letter
description:
### R E L E A S E D :) ###

Type & Shoot Letters is a fun game where you have to type letters that show underneath monsters' bodies in order to shoot at them!

Type fast in order to SURVIVE !

Keyboard is also dynamic and changes over the time. This makes it hard.

Type & Shoot Letters Features:

  • Endless game - Infinite levels
  • 10 challenging Enemies
  • Earn gold to buy new weapons and collect randomised boxed for power-ups.

9 weapons for you to survive

  • Pistol
  • Rifle
  • M4
  • Sniper
  • Auto Sniper
  • Rocket
  • Laser
  • Tesla

Early stage screenshots have been attached for you to view

Actual game play screenshots have been attached.

Any comment(s) would be highly appreciated.
